intent_atoms.description: Implement deterministic corrupt fixture set (Fixtures/Corrupt/) and associated metadata, generator support, and tolerant parsing smoke tests.
Run swift test --filter CorruptFixtureCorpusTests to verify implementation.

functional_units.name: Corrupt Fixture Corpus API
functional_units.description: Provides deterministic corrupt fixture set and metadata for testing

functional_units.name: Fixture Catalog Manifest
functional_units.description: JSON catalog of corrupt fixtures used by the system

functional_units.name: Generator Support for Corrupt Fixtures
functional_units.description: Tooling to generate corrupt fixture data

functional_units.name: Tolerant Parsing Smoke Tests
functional_units.description: Tests that validate parsing tolerates corrupt data

functional_units.name: Accessibility Contrast Flag Validation Workflow
functional_units.description: Process for capturing reproduction steps and findings for contrast helper mismatch
